## Scope Check
> **Before creating:** Is this issue atomic? Can it be completed in a single focused session?
> If this requires multiple unrelated changes, break it into separate issues.
> The more granular and specific, the better results you'll get.

## Summary
[One sentence. If you need two sentences, the issue is too big.]

## User Story
As a [user type], I want [one specific thing] so that [benefit].

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] [Specific, testable criterion]
- [ ] [Specific, testable criterion]

> Keep to 2-4 criteria max. More than that = issue is too big.

## Files Likely Affected
- [ ] [List specific files/components this will touch]

> If this touches more than 3-4 files, consider breaking it down further.

## Technical Notes
[Optional: API endpoints, dependencies, edge cases]

## Out of Scope
[What this issue explicitly does NOT include - helps prevent scope creep]

[MVP / v2 / Backlog]
